name: thunder-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves an eelektrik into eelektross, an eevee into jolteon, or a pikachu into raichu.
short_effect: Evolves an Eelektrik into Eelektross, an Eevee into Jolteon, or a Pikachu into Raichu.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a distinct thunderbolt pattern.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a distinct thunderbolt pattern.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a distinct thunderbolt pattern.
